bdi4jade.plan.planbody

Interface PlanBody

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.util.EventListener, GoalListener
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractPlanBody, AchieveOnPlanBody, BeliefGoalPlanBody, ChildPlan, ClearPlanBody, FSMPlanBody, HelloWorldParamPlan, HelloWorldPlan, MyPlan, MyPlan, MyPlan, MyPlan1Body, MyPlan2Body, ParallelActionPlanBody, ParallelGoalPlanBody, ParentPlan, PerformMovePlanBody, PingPlan, PongPlan, SequentialActionPlanBody, SequentialGoalPlanBody, SuccessPlanBody, TestPlanBody, TopLevelPlanBody, TransportationPlanBody

    public interface PlanBody
extends GoalListener
    This interface defines a PlanBody. Plans are executed as behaviors ( Behaviour), but executed in the BDI context, these behaviors should also implement this interface.
    Author:
    ingrid

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispatchGoal(Goal goal)
      Dispatches a goal to be achieved.
      void dispatchProtectedGoal(Goal goal)
      Dispatches a goal to be achieved, using the capability (or its children capabilities) associated with the plan.
      void dispatchProtectedSubgoal(Goal subgoal)
      Dispatches a subgoal to be achieved, using the capability (or its children capabilities) associated with the plan.
      void dispatchProtectedSubgoalAndListen(Goal subgoal)
      Dispatches a subgoal to be achieved, using the capability (or its children capabilities) associated with the plan, and registers itself as a listener to receive a notification of the end of execution of the goal.
      void dispatchSubgoal(Goal subgoal)
      Dispatches a subgoal to be achieved.
      void dispatchSubgoalAndListen(Goal subgoal)
      Dispatches a subgoal to be achieved and registers itself as a listener to receive a notification of the end of execution of the goal.
      BeliefBase getBeliefBase()
      Returns the belief base of the capability.
      Plan.EndState getEndState()
      Returns the end state of the execution of this plan.
      Goal getGoal()
      Returns the goal to be achieved by this plan instance.
      GoalEvent getGoalEvent()
      Returns a goal event from the queue.

      Returns a goal event from the queue.
      GoalEvent getGoalEvent(long ms)
      Returns a goal event from the queue.
      Plan getPlan()
      Returns the Plan that is associated with this plan instance.
      void init(Plan plan, Intention intention)
      Initializes this plan body.
      int onEnd()
      This method is invoked just once after this behaviour has ended.
      void onStart()
      This method is executed just once before starting this plan body execution.
      void reset()
      Restores plan body initial state.
      void restart()
      Restarts a blocked plan body.
      void start()
      Starts the plan body, a Behaviour, associated with this plan.
      void stop()
      Stops the plan body, a Behaviour, associated with this plan.

        Dispatches a subgoal to be achieved, using the capability (or its children capabilities) associated with the plan.
        Parameters:

      • dispatchProtectedSubgoalAndListen

        void dispatchProtectedSubgoalAndListen(Goal subgoal)
        Dispatches a subgoal to be achieved, using the capability (or its children capabilities) associated with the plan, and registers itself as a listener to receive a notification of the end of execution of the goal.
        Parameters:
        subgoal - the subgoal to be dispatched.

      • dispatchSubgoal

        void dispatchSubgoal(Goal subgoal)
        Dispatches a subgoal to be achieved.
        Parameters:
        subgoal - the subgoal to be dispatched.

      • dispatchSubgoalAndListen

        void dispatchSubgoalAndListen(Goal subgoal)
        Dispatches a subgoal to be achieved and registers itself as a listener to receive a notification of the end of execution of the goal.
        Parameters:
        subgoal - the subgoal to be dispatched.

      • getBeliefBase

        BeliefBase getBeliefBase()
        Returns the belief base of the capability.
        Returns:
        the belief base containing the beliefs.

      • getEndState

        Plan.EndState getEndState()
        Returns the end state of the execution of this plan.
        Returns:
        the end state of this plan, or null if it has not finished yet.

      • getGoal

        Goal getGoal()
        Returns the goal to be achieved by this plan instance.
        Returns:
        the goal.

      • getGoalEvent

        GoalEvent getGoalEvent()
        Returns a goal event from the queue. If the queue is empty, the behavior associated with this plan instance is blocked.
        Returns:
        the goal event or null if the queue is empty.

      • getGoalEvent

        GoalEvent getGoalEvent(boolean block)
        Returns a goal event from the queue. If the queue is empty, the behavior associated with this plan instance is going to be blocked if the parameter passed to this method is true.
        Parameters:
        block - true if the behavior must be blocked if the queue is empty.
        Returns:
        the goal event or null if the queue is empty.

      • getGoalEvent

        GoalEvent getGoalEvent(long ms)
        Returns a goal event from the queue. If the queue is empty, the behavior associated with this plan instance is going to be blocked for the specified milliseconds.
        Parameters:
        ms - the maximum amount of time that the behavior must be blocked.
        Returns:
        the goal event or null if the queue is empty.

      • getPlan

        Plan getPlan()
        Returns the Plan that is associated with this plan instance.
        Returns:
        the plan.

      • init

        void init(Plan plan,
        Intention intention)
          throws PlanInstantiationException
        Initializes this plan body. It associates this plan body with a plan definition (Plan) and an Intention. If this plan body has already been initialized, this method throws a PlanInstantiationException.
        Parameters:
        plan - the plan associated this this plan body.
        intention - the intention that this plan instance have to achieve.
        Throws:
        PlanBodyInstantiationException - if this plan body has already been initialized.
        PlanInstantiationException

      • onEnd

        int onEnd()
        This method is invoked just once after this behaviour has ended. Therefore, it acts as an epilog for the task represented by this plan body. Note that onEnd is called after the plan body has already stopped its execution.
        Returns:
        an integer code representing the termination value of the behaviour.
        See Also:
        Behaviour.onEnd()

      • onStart

        void onStart()
        This method is executed just once before starting this plan body execution. Therefore, it acts as a prolog to the task represented by this plan body.
        See Also:
        Behaviour.onStart()

      • reset

        void reset()
        Restores plan body initial state. This method must be implemented by concrete subclasses in such a way that calling reset() on a plan body object is equivalent to destroying it and recreating it back.
        See Also:
        Behaviour.reset()

      • restart

        void restart()
        Restarts a blocked plan body.
        See Also:
        Behaviour.restart()

      • start

        void start()
        Starts the plan body, a Behaviour, associated with this plan.

      • stop

        void stop()
        Stops the plan body, a Behaviour, associated with this plan. If the body implements the DisposablePlanBody, it invokes the method to about the plan body, so it can perform finalizations.
